entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mono][arm64] Runtime tests failures for Mini JIT on Arm64 #82859
    Future
  • Linux installers are not creating /etc/dotnet/install_location file #82858
  • Assembly loaded a second in default host context by RuntimeAssembly.GetExportedTypes #82856
  • Confusing documentation for `AggregateException.GetBaseException()` #82853
  • Expression.Bind parameter validation is incorrect. #82850
  • Consider passing `enregisterLocalVars` as a template argument to LinearScan #82848
  • [mono] Roslyn csc operations sometimes hangs on ppc64le #82847
  • Consider merging Microsoft.Extensions.Options.DataAnnotations into Microsoft.Extensions.Options #82844
    8.0.0
  • Unable to find dotnet runtime when DOTNET_ROOT is set on Mariner #82843
  • [API Proposal]: IPAddress should implement ISpanFormattable/Parsable<IPAddress> #82842
    8.0.0
  • Potential 1.5x performance improvement for `Random.Shuffle()` #82838
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice failure #82837
  • Cannot instantiate nullable class with Activator. Is it a bug? #82835
  • Workaround broken Mono System.Drawing facades #82829
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock libpthread_2_23!pthread_cond_wait #82828
  • Equal method returns true but Hashcodes are different #82825
    Future
  • Net7 : System.MissingMethodException: Constructor on type '' not found. #82824
  • Unencrypted Plain Http2 Connection fails handshake if an Antivirus Antimalware or Firewall stays in the middle and sends a zero leghted TCP packet with an ACK flags back to the client HTTP2 setup packet, impacts also on the localhost #82820
  • [browser][build][libraries] Properties are not propagated from nested build upwards #82819
    8.0.0
  • GC overestimates available memory #82815
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Memory.Tests broken if SIMD is enabled #82808

Closed

  • MissingMethodException: set_Encoder on JsonSerializationOptions #82798
  • [NativeAOT] No variables or object inspection when debugging class library #82802
  • Add CollectionsMarshal support for the `HashSet<T>` collection #82840
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions from peephole optimization of removing mov instruction #82776
  • `AssemblyName` lacks override on `GetHashCode` resulting multiple values in `HashSet<AssemblyName>` #82580
  • Net 7 Kestrel windows service hangs after a period of time #82207
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice failure #65448
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `OperatingSystem.IsWasi()` #78389
    8.0.0
  • RPM not found when installing SDK 7.0 on CentOS 7 via yum #82831
  • [Test Failure] HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ReservedFrameType_Throws #82772
    8.0.0
  • [browser][icu] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82592
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks 8.0.100-1.23067.1 does not include a .NET 8 linker #82823
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Throws runtime error in `mscorlib`, expected class `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ValueTaskAwaiter1` #82193
    8.0.0
  • Mono runtime does not raise open file limit on Linux #82428
    8.0.0
  • Implementation of Parallel.ForEachAsync for .NET Standard 2.0 #82727
  • createdump failing to capture a dump during force quit of VSMac #70696
    8.0.0
  • VSMac Crash Reports Missing Frames #78421
    8.0.0
  • Null dereferencing makes AccessViolationException under certain condition. #72202
    8.0.0
  • builds breaking because analyzers fail with `Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'type')` #82467
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify IndexOfAnyAsciiByteValues for needles with 0 on X86 #82866
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [browser] remove unused methods #82865
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • ActiveIssue for BuildInvalidSignatureTwice on mono interpreter. #82864
    area-System.Security
  • Add OS/architecture specific CLRDEBUGINFO resource #82863
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable DwarfDump AOT test in Release #82862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix string allocation in DateTimeParse.ParseByFormat #82861
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview2] Add stub for mini_is_gsharedvt_inst #82860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82855
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82854
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82852
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82851
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Disable folding small-typed returned indirections #82846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Add tests for build with SIMD disabled #82845
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove cached RW mapping when the corresponding RX one is released #82841
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • Have bool and string implement ISpanParsable<T> #82836
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][js] legacy JS interop optional via FeatureWasmLegacyJsInterop #82834
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] managed legacy JS interop optional via FeatureWasmLegacyJsInterop #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Implement correct handling of new constraint in ilc #82818
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable runtime tests running on arm64 with mini JIT #82814
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Stop storing the parsed RID fallback graph #82811
    area-Host
  • Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #82810
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit a list of exported methods into the AOT image and load them when the image is loaded. #82809
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
  • Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82804
  • Nullable annotation fixes #82803
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Implement load_assembly delegate for hosting API #82797
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Implement more jiterpreter opcodes #82849
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • JIT: Unify arm64 and x64 GT_SELECT handling #82610
  • Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82245
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Add an internal GC lock API #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [API] OperatingSystem.IsWasi() #82817
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fix ReservedFrameType_Throws #82787
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [QUIC] Disable failing test on arm machines #82780
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll #82618
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][icu][libraries] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82619
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix build failure in pal_ssl #82816
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser] delete unused mono_wasm_* functions #82767
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enable interlocked profiling for basic block counts too #82775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotation changes only (part 3) #82697
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][threads] save/restore errno in thread state transitions #79856
    area-VM-threading-mono
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Retain OutDir for ioslike tests #82313
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #81082
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Glossary: Change source for SoS to Wayback Machine link #81178
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Unify Array enumerators between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #82751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe lock implementation #82790
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Host, community-contribution
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Call base.DisposeAsync on DerivedFileStreamStrategy #82459
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Introducing ValidateOptionsResultBuilder #82749
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • disable SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose also on Catalyst #82782
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
    area-Build-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #82781
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where caller requires no initialization #82711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • [mono] Move networking code to debugger component #82785
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] Smoke tests for node on runtime pipeline #78769
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Pass wasi invariant mode through env variable #82707
    arch-wasm
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary relinking when publishing a blazor project for AOT #82748
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use output size helpers for cryptographic primitives #82800
    area-System.Security
  • disable tests on Server 2022 with spanish locale #82578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2 #82698
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
